page.title: 03Girls Games
page.content: I like playing{hop! hop! hop! to the {Lollipop Shop!}It is sometimes funny. The person who is 'on it' has to tag your hand and you have to say 'stop!'. The best game on the playground is { {in-twin-twa.} It is a good game because you have to do handstands all of the time. Another game that I like is{salt-pepper-dolly-case.} You use a skipping rope for this game. You have to jump over the end of the skipping rope as it swings in a circle. Another game that I like to play is{ {hide-and-seek.} This is good fun when you are hiding in a funny place.
